name: Quantum Driller
description:
--TEMPORARY FOR DEMONSTRATION PURPOSES--

This version of the game has 5 levels for demonstration purposes only!

Instructions:

Quantum driller is a puzzle platformer game where you have to use physics to your advantage in order to solve levels.

Use your quantum drill to open portals on gray surfaces, solve the levels by reaching the yellow surface!

Controls:

A/D for horizontal movement, W/Space to jump

Mouse controls the quantum drill, LMB/RMB to shoot quantum portals
